summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows a character standing on a snow-covered path in a forested, mountainous area. The character is holding a staff and facing a group of figures in the distance. There is a red arrow pointing to the right side of the image, indicating a direction or point of interest. The scene is set in a wintry environment with trees and rocky terrain.

There is a red arrow pointing to the right side of the image, indicating a direction or point of interest. The scene is set in a wintry environment with trees and rocky terrain.
